channel.title: CVE Feed for sonalsinha21 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sonalsinha21 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1337|2024-02-20T18:56:25.369Z -- sonalsinha21 -- skt%20page%20builder
item.description: The SKT Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'saveSktbuilderPageData' function in all versions up to, and including, 4.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to inject arbitrary content into pages.

item.title: CVE-2024-5091|2024-06-08T06:54:37.503Z -- sonalsinha21 -- skt%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The SKT Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Age Gate and Creative Slider widgets in all versions up to, and including, 2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
